data.homeworkTitle: 第十六章 急性化脓性腹膜炎和腹部损伤病人的护理

questions.title: 男性，32岁。急性腹膜炎手术后l周，体温升高38℃，伴腹泻、里急后重。下列检查最有意义的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"内镜检查","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"腹部X线平片","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"大便常规化验  ","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"腹腔穿刺术","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"直肠指检","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 女性，58岁，急性化脓性腹膜炎术后第一天。病人对留置胃管的作用不理解，要求拔除。护士对胃管作用的解释不妥的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"可以预防胃出血","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"有利于胃肠功能的恢复","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"避免胃肠内积气积液","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"可以减轻腹胀","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"有利于胃肠吻合口的愈合","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"平卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"侧卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"俯卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"半卧位","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"头低足高位","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 男性，32岁，与朋友聚餐后，突发上腹部剧烈疼痛。体检：腹部膨隆，上腹压痛明显，有反跳痛和腹肌紧张。下列处理不正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"禁食","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"肠内外营养支持","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"应用抗生素控制感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"静脉输液","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"半卧体位","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 急性腹膜炎的非手术护理中错误的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"胃肠减压","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"有效抗炎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"禁饮食","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"使用强效镇痛药E严格病情观察","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 腹部损伤伴有少量肠管脱出时，首选的急救措施是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"迅速将肠管还纳腹腔","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"用消毒纱布覆盖并包扎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"凡土林纱布覆盖并包扎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"用盐水纱布覆盖并包扎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"用消毒或清洁器皿覆盖并包扎","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 腹部损伤诊断未明确前,下述治疗措施不正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"慎用吗啡类镇痛药","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"严密观察生命体征的变化","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"定时检查腹部体征的发展","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"灌肠通便,观察大便的性质","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"非手术治疗期间病情未见好转,甚至加剧者,需剖腹探查","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 腹部损伤有合并以下问题时应优先处理
腹部损伤的护理，下列哪项不正确
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"严密观察病情变化，至少每半小时测血压、脉搏、呼吸、体温1次","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"给予抗生素，开放性损伤应给破伤风抗毒血清","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"观察期腹痛严重者，可给予吗啡止痛","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"非手术治疗期间要求绝对卧床休息","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"无内脏损伤者可给予流质或半流汁饮食","IsAnswer":false}]
